overview: Stone Tone, a rapper/producer, hailing from the Eternal City but living in the Big Smoke for a number of years now, grew up as an East-coast head and this can be heard in numerous of his compositions. However, donâ€™t be surprised if he delivers you with a down south anthem or a west coast ridah beat as innovation is at the heart of Stone Toneâ€™s beat-making principles. Stone Tone compositions are featured on several Italian and US official releases.
